S.FORM: == 素田主管與Tanga Hola == Srarl trang maki Taywal qu Gipun mga ,pqsugan nya hokung mtqutux nagsal ,trang mcmyan ga ptman bway ana nanu ,ryax na hkungan lga,nusa msli Pyasan kwara qu Tayal ,mpuw sazing hi mhangan hkungan qasa ru mcira qalang Pyasan ,masoq lasa lga mangay myugi msspung mkiyap ,ssyaqan balay,Laqi mqwas biru Pyasan ga ,shtuy nya kmayal ke Tayal ,kya qu kmal ke Tayal ga psyugan nya qlcing mtapaq,Kshat na Gipun mwah kshat qalang na Tayal ga ,lama mqbaq ke Tayal ru gaga Tayal la,maki qutux kshat mrhuw 素田 qu lalu nya,mwah kshat qalang na Rahaw,baq balay ke Tayal,msblaq balay ki Tanga Hola,maki qutux gbyan, kahul qmayah mwah nagsal qu Tanga,aki phapuy qu bes nya Pisuy Batu, ungat qu turing qsya,musa mita puqing qsya qu Tanga,ktan ga nyax tmangun magal na kshat ,galun nya qu qsya musa ngasal ,ini lawa kbsiq, ungat qu qsya,san mita ga nyax galun kshat loziy,musa minciwal pinbzih na qu Tanga lga ,mhmut qu Tanga musa Raka smayu qu 素田 muci, swa nanak isu ini su ppwah qsya, isu nanak pqyanux ga cyux kwara qsya su isu ru aring kya lga, ini pkayal qu sazing qani la ,musa pitu bingi babaw nya lga,maki qutux gbyan, pongan hngiyang 'kolak kolak' mkyamin Gipun tehok blihun lga ,mhuway balay qu ke nya: Tanga cyux su m'abi la?nyux qu mwah cisal sunan ,sgyah nya ubaq 素田 ,nyux mbing qutux yuyut qwaw Gipun,mtama bang sakaw kmal muci:Tanga kun balay wal yaqeh, nyax ku mwah tmatuk tunux suna, laxiy ta psyaqeh la,hmaw qwaw ru sbiq nya Tanga,gbyan nasa ga wal mblaq mcisal mggop, aring kya msblaq balay lozi ,nanu yasa qu 素田 qani ga wal nya baqun qu gaga na Tayal uziy la, Iban Batu .在Tayal的gaga khokun utux)族人也說(ini an skblaq mqyanux) Iban Batu Iban Batu ,男方silan Hola gaga tayal 去思考, ,Silan Hola 的長兄Tanga Hola Yukan Tanga Teril 當時被Iban Batu (Pisuy Batu)batu)接二連三的夢見當時Teril Teril

== 素田主管與Tanga Hola == Srarl trang maki Taywal qo Gipon mga ,pqsogan nya hokong mtqotox nagsal ,trang mcmyan ga ptman bway ana nano ,ryax na hkongan lga,nosa msli Pyasan kwara qo Tayal ,mpow sazing hi mhangan hkongan qasa ro mcira qalang Pyasan ,masoq lasa lga mangay myogi msspong mkiyap ,ssyaqan balay,Laqi mqwas biro Pyasan ga ,shtoy nya kmayal ke Tayal ,kya qo kmal ke Tayal ga psyogan nya qlcing mtapaq,Kshat na Gipon mwah kshat qalang na Tayal ga ,lama mqbaq ke Tayal ro gaga Tayal la,maki qotox kshat mrhow 素田 qo lalo nya,mwah kshat qalang na Rahaw,baq balay ke Tayal,msblaq balay ki Tanga Hola,maki qotox gbyan, kahol qmayah mwah nagsal qo Tanga,aki phapoy qo bes nya Pisoy Bato, ongat qo toring qsya,mosa mita poqing qsya qo Tanga,ktan ga nyax tmangon magal na kshat ,galon nya qo qsya mosa ngasal ,ini lawa kbsiq, ongat qo qsya,san mita ga nyax galon kshat loziy,mosa minciwal pinbzih na qo Tanga lga ,mhmot qo Tanga mosa Raka smayo qo 素田 moci, swa nanak iso ini so ppwah qsya, iso nanak pqyanox ga cyox kwara qsya so iso ro aring kya lga, ini pkayal qo sazing qani la ,mosa pito bingi babaw nya lga,maki qotox gbyan, pongan hngiyang 'kolak kolak' mkyamin Gipon tehok blihon lga ,mhoway balay qo ke nya: Tanga cyox so m'abi la?nyox qo mwah cisal sonan ,sgyah nya obaq 素田 ,nyox mbing qotox yoyot qwaw Gipon,mtama bang sakaw kmal moci:Tanga kon balay wal yaqeh, nyax ko mwah tmatok tonox sona, laxiy ta psyaqeh la,hmaw qwaw ro sbiq nya Tanga,gbyan nasa ga wal mblaq mcisal mggop, aring kya msblaq balay lozi ,nano yasa qo 素田 qani ga wal nya baqon qo gaga na Tayal oziy la, Iban Bato .在Tayal的gaga khokon otox)族人也說(ini an skblaq mqyanox) Iban Bato Iban Bato ,男方silan Hola gaga tayal 去思考, ,Silan Hola 的長兄Tanga Hola Yokan Tanga Teril 當時被Iban Bato (Pisoy Bato)bato)接二連三的夢見當時Teril Teril
